activities.title: City tour
activities.longDescription: Discover the city at your own pace in one day and create your own tour of Madrid with the hop-on hop-off service offered by the Madrid City Tour. Our tour buses are double-deckers, with an open-top deck to offer you a marvellous panoramic view of the city.
openingHour: Buses every 10min in our bus stop (please check on our website)

activities.title: Madrid Plaza Mayor
activities.longDescription: The Plaza Mayor (English: Main Square) is a major public space in the heart of Madrid, the capital of Spain. It was once the centre of Old Madrid. It was first built (1580–1619) during the Habsburg period of Philip III's reign. Only a few Spanish blocks away is another famous plaza, the Puerta del Sol. The Plaza Mayor is for the people of Madrid and tourists to shop, walk around, eat, and enjoy the outdoors.

activities.title: Hamburg Museum
activities.description: Visit of the Museum of Hamburg
activities.longDescription: The Hamburg Museum, also known as Museum für Hamburgische Geschichte ('Museum for Hamburg History'), is a history museum located in the city of Hamburg in northern Germany. The museum was established at its current location in 1922, although its parent organization was started in 1839. The museum was named hamburgmuseum in 2006. It is located near the Planten un Blomen park in the center of Hamburg.[1] The museum is commonly reviewed among the museums of the city of Hamburg
